title: About the Act:2 update.
body: i think the Act:2 update messed up with the Act:1 event, after the Act:2 coming out,my Act:1 mission is not getting done for EVER before the update, my kills counted but now the kills are not getting counted. completely not getting counted. i am not sure if it is just a error for only Me, or it is same for others too.

replies.body: I got something similar here, i complete act 1, got the icon, but my act 2 doesn't count at all
